title: StrategicAI: Multi-Agent Decision Support System
organization: McKinsey & Company / Technical University of Munich
description: Developed a multi-agent LLM decision-support system integrating retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), tool use, and autonomous agent collaboration for strategic reasoning. Outperformed ChatGPT-4o in structured decision-making; published at ECML 2025.

title: CreateData4AI: Scalable Annotation Platform
description: Led a 4-member team to build a scalable, collaborative annotation platform using Next.js, FastAPI, and Ray for distributed embedding computation, reducing dataset processing time from 6 days to 5 minutes.

title: AI Debate Simulator
description: An interactive app where two AI models debate on any topic, streamed in real-time, and a third model judges their arguments based on clarity, logic, evidence, rebuttal quality, and civility.

title: Open Banking API Aggregator & Financial NLP
description: Designed and led Oman’s first Open Banking API integration and an NLP-based SMS parser for transaction classification. Scaled cloud infrastructure on AWS and launched award-winning fintech apps.

title: Charity Donation App (Dar Al Atta)
description: Built and deployed a cross-platform mobile donation app using Flutter and .NET Core with integrated payment gateways and case management, successfully launched on App Store and Google Play.
